panels.description: Number of PRs merged in period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*) FROM github_pull_requests
JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)

panels.title: PRs Merged in Period

panels.description: Number of repositories that had PRs merged

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(DISTINCT repo_id) FROM github_pull_requests
JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)

panels.title: Across This Many Repos

panels.description: Number of PR authors in period

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(DISTINCT author_login) FROM github_pull_requests
JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)

panels.title: Unique PR Authors

panels.description: Count of PRs merged within time period for matching repositories

targets.rawSql:
SELECT base_repository_name, count(*) FROM github_pull_requests
JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE merged AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
GROUP BY base_repository_name ORDER BY count(*) DESC

panels.title: PRs Merged by Repository

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	count(*),
	base_repository_name,
	$__timeGroup(merged_at, '${interval}', 0) AS time
FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
GROUP BY time, base_repository_name
ORDER BY time

panels.description: The average (mean) duration between a PR creation and merge

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM github_pull_requests.merged_at - github_pull_requests.created_at)) AS time_to_merge
FROM github_pull_requests
JOIN repos ON (repos.id = github_pull_requests.repo_id)
WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)

panels.title: Mean Time To Merge for Period

panels.description: 95th percentile of time to merge of selected PRs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT percentile_disc(0.95) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY time_to_merge) as p95 FROM (
  SELECT
  	EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM github_pull_requests.merged_at - github_pull_requests.created_at) AS time_to_merge
  FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON (github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id)
  WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
  AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
  AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
) AS prs

panels.title: p95 Time To Merge

targets.rawSql:
SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM github_pull_requests.merged_at - github_pull_requests.created_at) / 3600 AS time_to_merge
FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(merged_at, '${interval}', 0) AS time,
	AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM github_pull_requests.merged_at - github_pull_requests.created_at)) AS time_to_merge
FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(merged_at, '${interval}', 0) AS time,
	AVG(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM github_pull_requests.merged_at - github_pull_requests.created_at)) AS time_to_merge,
	base_repository_name
FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
GROUP BY time, base_repository_name
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Mean Time To Merge by Repo (per ${interval})

panels.description: The average (mean) number of lines added by a PR

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	AVG(additions)
FROM github_pull_requests
JOIN repos ON (repos.id = github_pull_requests.repo_id)
WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)

panels.title: Avg. Additions

panels.description: The average (mean) number of lines removed by a PR

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	AVG(deletions)
FROM github_pull_requests
JOIN repos ON (repos.id = github_pull_requests.repo_id)
WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)

panels.title: Avg. Deletions

panels.description: The average (mean) number of files modified by a PR

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
	AVG(changed_files)
FROM github_pull_requests
JOIN repos ON (repos.id = github_pull_requests.repo_id)
WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)

panels.title: Avg. Files Modified

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroup(merged_at, '${interval}', 0) AS time,
	AVG(changed_files)
FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE merged_at IS NOT NULL
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
GROUP BY time
ORDER BY time

SELECT count(*) FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE merged AND review_decision <> 'APPROVED'
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)

SELECT base_repository_name, author_login, title, url, merged_at FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE merged AND review_decision <> 'APPROVED'
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
ORDER BY merged_at DESC

SELECT count(*), base_repository_name FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE merged AND review_decision <> 'APPROVED'
AND $__timeFilter(merged_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
GROUP BY base_repository_name
ORDER BY count(*) DESC

SELECT count(*)
FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE NOT merged AND state = 'OPEN'
AND (now() - github_pull_requests.created_at) > '5 days'::interval
AND $__timeFilter(github_pull_requests.created_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)

SELECT
  base_repository_name,
  now() - github_pull_requests.created_at AS time_open,
  author_login,
  title,
  url,
  github_pull_requests.created_at
FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE NOT merged AND state = 'OPEN'
AND (now() - github_pull_requests.created_at) > '5 days'::interval
AND $__timeFilter(github_pull_requests.created_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
ORDER BY time_open DESC

panels.title: PRs Open for More Than 5 Days

targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*), base_repository_name
FROM github_pull_requests JOIN repos ON github_pull_requests.repo_id = repos.id
WHERE NOT merged AND state = 'OPEN'
AND (now() - github_pull_requests.created_at) > '5 days'::interval
AND $__timeFilter(github_pull_requests.created_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? base_repository_name
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
GROUP BY base_repository_name
ORDER BY count(*) DESC

panels.title: PRs Opens More than 5 Days by Repo

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    EXTRACT(DOW FROM public.github_pull_requests.created_at) AS day_of_week_num,
    TO_CHAR(public.github_pull_requests.created_at, 'Day') AS day_of_week,
    COUNT(*) AS total_pull_requests
FROM public.github_pull_requests
INNER JOIN public.github_repo_info ON public.github_pull_requests.repo_id = public.github_repo_info.repo_id
INNER JOIN public.repos ON public.github_pull_requests.repo_id = public.repos.id
AND $__timeFilter(public.github_pull_requests.created_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? (public.github_repo_info.owner || '/' || public.github_repo_info.name)
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (public.repos.tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1,2
ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Pull Requests By Day of Week

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    (public.github_repo_info.owner || '/' || public.github_repo_info.name),
    EXTRACT(DOW FROM public.github_pull_requests.created_at) AS day_of_week_num,
    TO_CHAR(public.github_pull_requests.created_at, 'Day') AS day_of_week,
    COUNT(*) AS total_pull_requests
FROM public.github_pull_requests
INNER JOIN public.github_repo_info ON public.github_pull_requests.repo_id = public.github_repo_info.repo_id
INNER JOIN public.repos ON public.github_pull_requests.repo_id = public.repos.id
AND $__timeFilter(public.github_pull_requests.created_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? (public.github_repo_info.owner || '/' || public.github_repo_info.name)
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (public.repos.tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1,2,3
ORDER BY 1,2

panels.title: Pull Requests By Repo By Day of Week

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    public.github_pull_requests.author_name,
    EXTRACT(DOW FROM public.github_pull_requests.created_at) AS day_of_week_num,
    TO_CHAR(public.github_pull_requests.created_at, 'Day') AS day_of_week,
    COUNT(*) AS total_pull_requests
FROM public.github_pull_requests
INNER JOIN public.github_repo_info ON public.github_pull_requests.repo_id = public.github_repo_info.repo_id
INNER JOIN public.repos ON public.github_pull_requests.repo_id = public.repos.id
AND $__timeFilter(public.github_pull_requests.created_at) AND '${repositories:json}'::jsonb ? (public.github_repo_info.owner || '/' || public.github_repo_info.name)
AND (CASE WHEN jsonb_array_length('${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) <> 0 THEN (public.repos.tags @> '${repository_tags:json}'::jsonb) ELSE true END)
GROUP BY 1,2,3
ORDER BY 1,2

panels.title: Pull Requests By Author By Day of Week

list.definition: SELECT owner || '/' || name FROM github_repo_info JOIN repos ON github_repo_info.repo_id = repos.id
list.label: Repositories
list.name: repositories
list.query: SELECT owner || '/' || name FROM github_repo_info JOIN repos ON github_repo_info.repo_id = repos.id

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT value FROM repos, jsonb_array_elements_text(tags)
list.description: Filter by repos with specific tags. If "All" is selected, any repo will match (including those without tags)
list.label: Repository Tags
list.name: repository_tags
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT value FROM repos, jsonb_array_elements_text(tags)
